alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 8:53AM EST until December 23 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches for a storm total of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...In Maine, Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, and Northern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Coos County. * WHEN...Until Noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible due to icy road conditions. Snow will change over to rain causing a period of slushy roads that will lead to extremely slick conditions. Plan on delaying travel to allow time for road conditions to improve. The combination of heavy wet snow and gusty winds will lead to snapped branches and a few downed trees. Widespread to numerous power outages likely.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
